name: Jam Master Jay
description: '''Jason William Mizell''' (January 21, 1965 â€“ October 30, 2002), better known by his stage name '''Jam Master Jay''', was an American musician, record producer and DJ. He was the DJ of the influential [[Hip-hop|hip hop]] group [[Run-DMC]]. During the 1980s, Run-DMC became one of the biggest hip hop groups, credited with breaking hip hop into mainstream music.  Mizell was murdered in his [[Queens]] recording studio in 2002 and was left unsolved for 22 years. During February 2024, two men named Ronald Washington and his godson Karl Jordan Jr., were convicted for the 2002 drug-related murder, with a third man, Jay Bryant, facing a separate trial in 2026.
